summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Plats 45E and 45W, Pages 118 and 119 of The Official Zoning Map to rezone property located within an area generally bounded by Empire Way S., a line approximately midblock between 21st and 22nd Avenues S., and irregular boundaries generally between S. Jackson St. and S. Dearborn Street from RM 800 to RD 5000. (C.F. 287326 - Petition of Department of Community Development.)
